name: SpEGGtactular Pinball
description:
This pinball game was originally made in spring of 2016 for a class assignment. Main game was made in about a week. Lots of eggs. Lots of puns.

CLICK HERE TO PLAY THE GAME (download button is kind of weird with links)

Credits:

  • "Happiness is Egg Shaped" by The Seahorses
  • "I love egg" song by Peoplesign (I modified and morphed the song a bit)
  • Sound Effects from https://www.soundsnap.com
  • Egg 3D model by Mo Perlow
